About Us

Helping hand is a small remote-based team by a group of college and graduate friends that accepts academic and school-related commissions on different courses and subject areas.

Services Offered

Programming & Full Stack Development

C/C++, VB.Net, C#/C#.Net, Java, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Python, Database Queries, Flutter Mobile Apps

Multimedia and Graphics Design

Photo, Logo, Vector, Video, Mockups editing using Adobe Photoshop, Adode Lightroom, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Premiere Pro and Wondershare Filmora

General Computer-Related Tasks

Powerpoint Design and Animations, Flowcharts and Diagrams, Excel Formulas and Computuation, Computer Software Downloads, Movies & Series

Drawing, Worded Problems, Summaries and Reviews

Essay Writing, Portraits, Book Critique/Reviews, Researches
